title: Update: Woman arrested after abandoned newborn dies in Longueuil
author: Jack Wilson
blurb: The 33-year-old may be subject to a psychological evaluation and could face charges in connection with the infant's death, police said.

title: At least one person injured in spectacular multi-vehicle pileup on Highway 25
author: Montreal Gazette
blurb: The crash has reportedly left the driver of a tractor-trailer in critical condition.

title: For the first time in 38 years, Montreal bus drivers, m√©tro operators to launch strike action
author: Harry North
blurb: STM maintenance workers are also preparing for another strike.

title: Todd: Ivan Demidov's arrival with Canadiens a sight to behold
author: Jack Todd
blurb: Habs rookie casts spell on Canucks with remarkable patience, a ton of talent and lightning-quick reflexes in a tour de force display.

title: Quebec brings hammer down on doctors by adopting special law to force deal
author: Philip Authier
blurb: The CAQ invoked closure to fast track Bill 2, which includes a new salary structure for physicians and imposes stiff penalties for pressure tactics.
